trends: There has been one other sighting in Pleasantville
There were no other sightings in Pleasantville on or around May 1st 2004
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was spring May 1, 2004 after midnight; 1:15 am. I was on the back porch of the house property star-gazing. I saw what I thought was a star suddenly moving in the very distant night sky. Then it seemed to stop and then it moved again. I decided to get my camera and tripod and document the event. I guess I thought maybe it could be a satellite, but I didn't know. I never lost sight of the object and probably have over ten minutes of footage of whatever it is. In the footage there is a glow around the object as a result of the focus; and there are trees in the foreground to more clearly demonstrate the object's movement. Note: I did not see a glow around the object before the achieved focus.
Summary: I captured a UFO on miniDV tape with a tripod. First I was just star-gazing until one of them moved. Then I documented the movement.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
